thread.title: Selena Gomez Detects Ghosts With Her Phone App on 'Jimmy Fallon'
thread.title_full: Selena Gomez Detects Ghosts With Her Phone App on 'Jimmy Fallon'

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Selena Gomez Detects Ghosts With Her Phone App on 'Jimmy Fallon'
text:
Comments The 'Same Old Love' singer tracks ghosts and does Dubsmash on 'The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon'. 
Selena Gomez thinks that ghosts are real. Armed with an app on her cellphone, the former " Wizards of Waverly Place " actress channeled her inner ghost hunter during a recent visit to " The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon ". "I believe that spirits can tap into technology, why not right?" she told Jimmy Fallon , to which the host replied, "I don't know. I'm not gonna debate you on this." She then said, "I haven't used it here just yet so I thought I could do it with you." The duo also took turn using the popular audio recording app Dubsmash, mimicking John Travolta 's infamous Idina Menzel Oscar flub and Liam Neeson 's " Taken " quote. They later collaborated on lip-syncing her single "Same Old Love" from her newest studio album " Revival ".
